Title: Why does trying to break into the NT 3.1 kernel reboot my 486DX4 machine?

Title: Azure SDK Gets Communications Services Libraries, Based on Teams Tech -- Visual Studio Magazine
Description: They empower cloud developers to create applications that incorporate chat, voice calling, video calling, traditional telephone calling, SMS messaging and other real-time communication functionality.
